issue.title: [Python] Add function to assist with benchmarking Parquet scan performance
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1377](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1377). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be simpler to assess the raw performance of parquet-cpp Parquet scans to have something akin to https://github.com/apache/parquet-cpp/blob/master/tools/parquet-scan.cc available as a callable Python function. This way we can isolate the performance of scanning the file from converting it to Arrow (and to pandas)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1377?focusedCommentId=16154539) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
